events.message: I received the wrong item and want to request a refund because the product does not match what I ordered.
System identified keywords related to refund and processed case under the Refund category.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you're requesting a refund for the wrong item you received. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I’ve attached the photo showing the item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your payment method within 5 business days and send you a prepaid return label.
That sounds good, thank you for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the return label.
Your refund request has been processed and the return label email has been sent. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up to confirm that you received the refund and the return process was smooth. Please contact us if you have any issues.
The case has been closed after confirming the refund was completed successfully and the customer expressed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey was sent to the customer inviting feedback on the refund and support experience.
